1 //ON -25 degree
For IR Scope: 
+9000 -4350 +800 -1500 +750 -450 +750 -400 +800 -1500 +800 -400 +800 -1500 +750 -450 +750 -450 +750 -1550 +750 -400 +750 -450 +750 -1550 +750 -450 +750 -450 +750 -400 +800 -400 +800 -400 +750 -450 +750 -450 +750 -450 +750 -450 +750 -1500 +800 -1500 +750 -450 +750 -1550 +750 -450 +750 -400 +800 -400 +800 -1500 +750 -450 +750 -1550 +750 -400 +800 -400 +800 -1500 +750 -450 +750 
For Arduino sketch: 
unsigned int raw[74] = {9000,4350,800,1500,750,450,750,400,800,1500,800,400,800,1500,750,450,750,450,750,1550,750,400,750,450,750,1550,750,450,750,450,750,400,800,400,800,400,750,450,750,450,750,450,750,450,750,1500,800,1500,750,450,750,1550,750,450,750,400,800,400,800,1500,750,450,750,1550,750,400,800,400,800,1500,750,450,750,};
irsend.sendRaw(raw,74,38);

2 //OFF
For IR Scope: 
+9050 -4350 +700 -1600 +700 -500 +700 -450 +750 -450 +750 -450 +750 -1550 +700 -500 +700 -500 +700 -1550 +750 -450 +750 -450 +750 -1550 +700 -500 +700 -500 +700 -500 +700 -500 +700 -450 +750 -450 +750 -450 +700 -500 +700 -500 +650 -1650 +650 -550 +600 -550 +650 -1650 +650 -550 +650 -550 +650 -550 +650 -1600 +650 -550 +650 -1650 +650 -550 +650 -550 +650 -1650 +600 -550 +650

1 //COLD_26
For IR Scope:

5
For IR Scope:

6
For IR Scope:
